title: 2020 NFL Offseason Preview: What happens with Tom Brady, Drew Brees, CBA? (Football 2/6)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jason La Canfora to dissect the biggest storylines of the NFL offseason. It's a discussion that of course starts with the future of Tom Brady as well as Drew Brees and what the future could hold for these legendary quarterbacks (6:05). Could the appeal of broadcasting start contributing to earlier retirements? Plus, the Cowboys also pack intrigue and that will be no different over the next few months with Dak Prescott and Amari Cooper the focal points for potential new deals (23:30). What will happen in labor negotiations as sides inch towards a new CBA (35:00)? JLC has the answers. And lastly, in-depth analysis on the state of the Jacksonville Jaguars and their affiliation with London (39:15).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: The offseason is officially upon us, so Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora break down the biggest storylines set for the next few months.
